subject: Writing
title: The Birth of Rhetoric in Ancient Greece
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Birth of Rhetoric in Ancient Greece usable.

hook.text: In ancient Athens, there were no lawyers. Citizens argued their own cases. Persuasion was a survival skill.

buildup.text: When a tyrant fell in Syracuse around 467 BC, citizens flooded courts to reclaim seized property.
